```{r}
jan_2015_zillow = 
  read_csv("zillow/zhvi_2015.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  clean_names() |>
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
aug_2023_zillow = 
  read_csv("zillow/zhvi_2023.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  clean_names() |>
  drop_na()


jan2015_aug2023_df = 
  left_join(jan_2015_zillow, aug_2023_zillow, by = "region_id")

```

```{r}
nyc_zip_codes_url = "https://p8105.com/data/zip_codes.html"

nyc_zip_codes = read_html(nyc_zip_codes_url)

table_nyc_zip_codes = 
nyc_zip_codes |>
  html_table() |>
  first() |>
  slice(-1) |>
  as_tibble()

table_nyc_zip_codes <- table_nyc_zip_codes %>%
  mutate(Borough = case_match(
    County,  
    "New York" ~ "Manhattan",
    "Kings" ~ "Brooklyn",
    "Bronx" ~ "Bronx",
    "Queens" ~ "Queens",
    "Richmond" ~ "Staten Island"
  ))

```
